00110 void EnterIMPPersonalityQuiz( void )
00111 {
00112 
00113       // void answers out the quiz
00114   memset( &iQuizAnswerList, -1, sizeof( INT32 ) * MAX_NUMBER_OF_IMP_QUESTIONS );
00115    
00116       // if we are entering for first time, reset
00117       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion == MAX_NUMBER_OF_IMP_QUESTIONS )
00118       {
00119     giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion = 0;
00120       }
00121       // reset previous
00122       giPreviousPersonalityQuizQuestion = -1;
00123 
00124       // reset skills, attributes and personality
00125       ResetSkillsAttributesAndPersonality( );
00126 
00127       // create/destroy buttons for  questions, if needed
00128       CreateIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( );
00129 
00130       // now reset them
00131       ResetQuizAnswerButtons( );
00132 
00133       // create other buttons
00134       CreateIMPPersonalityQuizButtons( );
00135 
00136       return;
00137 }

00140 {
00141    // the background
00142       RenderProfileBackGround( );
00143

00145   PrintImpText( );
00146 
00147       // indent for current and last page numbers
00148       //RenderAttrib2IndentFrame(BTN_FIRST_COLUMN_X + 2, 365 );
00149 
00150       // the current and last question numbers
00151       PrintQuizQuestionNumber( );
00152 
00153 
00154 
00155       return;
00156 }
00157 
00158 void ExitIMPPersonalityQuiz( void )
00159 {
00160 
00161 
00162       // set previous to current, we want it's buttons gone!
00163   giPreviousPersonalityQuizQuestion = giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion;
00164 
00165 
00166       // destroy regular quiz buttons: the done and start over buttons
00167   DestroyIMPersonalityQuizButtons( );
00168 
00169       // destroy the buttons used for answers
00170   DestroyPersonalityQuizButtons( );
00171 
00172       if( fStartOverFlag )
00173       {
00174             fStartOverFlag = FALSE;
00175             giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion = 0;
00176       }
00177       return;
00178 }

00181 void HandleIMPPersonalityQuiz( void )
00182 {
00183   
00184       // create/destroy buttons for  questions, if needed
00185       CreateIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( );
00186       
00187       // handle keyboard input
00188       HandleIMPQuizKeyBoard( );
00189 
00190   if( iCurrentAnswer == -1)
00191       {
00192             DisableButton(    giIMPPersonalityQuizButton[0] );
00193       }
00194 
00195   return;
00196 }

00267 void DestroyIMPersonalityQuizButtons( void )
00268 {
00269       // this function will destroy the buttons needed for the IMP personality quiz page
00270   
00271       // the done button
00272   RemoveButton(giIMPPersonalityQuizButton[ 0 ] );
00273   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPPersonalityQuizButtonImage[ 0 ] );
00274 
00275   // the start over button
00276       RemoveButton(giIMPPersonalityQuizButton[ 1 ] );
00277   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPPersonalityQuizButtonImage[ 1 ] );
00278 
00279       // previosu button
00280       RemoveButton( giPreviousQuestionButton );
00281       UnloadButtonImage( giPreviousQuestionButtonImage );
00282 
00283       // next button
00284       RemoveButton( giNextQuestionButton );
00285       UnloadButtonImage( giNextQuestionButtonImage );
00286 
00287 
00288       return;
00289 }
00290 
00291 void CreateIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( void )
00292 {
00293   // this function will create the buttons for the personality quiz answer selections
00294   
00295   if( IMP_PERSONALITY_QUIZ != iCurrentImpPage )
00296       {
00297             // not valid pagre, get out
00298             return;
00299       }
00300 
00301 
00302       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion == giPreviousPersonalityQuizQuestion )
00303       {
00304             // mode has not changed, return;
00305             return;
00306       }
00307 
00308   // destroy old screens buttons
00309   DestroyPersonalityQuizButtons( );
00310   
00311       // re-render screen
00312       RenderProfileBackGround( );
00313 
00314   switch( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion )
00315   {
00316             case ( -1 ):
00317              // do nothing
00318             break;
00319             case ( 0 ):
00320              // 6 buttons
00321              iNumberOfPersonaButtons = 6;
00322             break;
00323             case ( 3 ):
00324                   // 5 buttons
00325                   iNumberOfPersonaButtons = 5;
00326     break;
00327             case ( 5 ):
00328                   // 5 buttons
00329                   iNumberOfPersonaButtons = 5;
00330     break;
00331             case ( 10 ):
00332                   // 5 buttons
00333                   iNumberOfPersonaButtons = 5;
00334     break;
00335             case ( 11 ):
00336                   // 5 buttons
00337                   iNumberOfPersonaButtons = 8;
00338 
00339     break;
00340             default:
00341       // 4 buttons
00342                   iNumberOfPersonaButtons = 4;
00343 
00344             break;
00345       }
00346   
00347   AddIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( iNumberOfPersonaButtons );  
00348 
00349       ToggleQuestionNumberButtonOn( iQuizAnswerList[ giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion ] );
00350 
00351       // re render text
00352       PrintImpText( );
00353 
00354       // the current and last question numbers
00355       PrintQuizQuestionNumber( );
00356 
00357       // title bar
00358       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00359 
00360       return;
00361 }

00363 
00364 void DestroyPersonalityQuizButtons( void )
00365 {
00366       
00367       // this function will destroy the buttons used in the previous personality question 
00368   // destroy old buttons
00369   switch( giPreviousPersonalityQuizQuestion  )
00370       {
00371             case ( -1 ):
00372                   // do nothing
00373                   break;
00374                   case ( 0 ):
00375              // 6 buttons
00376          DestroyIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( 6 );       
00377             break;
00378             case ( 3 ):
00379                   // 5 buttons
00380       DestroyIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( 5 );          
00381     break;
00382             case ( 5 ):
00383                   // 5 buttons
00384       DestroyIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( 5 );          
00385     break;
00386             case ( 10 ):
00387                   // 5 buttons
00388       DestroyIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( 5 );    
00389     break;
00390             case ( 11 ):
00391                   // 5 buttons
00392       DestroyIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( 8 );    
00393     break;
00394             default:
00395       // 4 buttons
00396       DestroyIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons( 4 );
00397             break;
00398       }
00399 
00400       return;
00401 }

00499 void DestroyIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtons(INT32 iNumberOfButtons )
00500 {
00501   INT32 iCounter = 0;
00502       for(iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOfButtons; iCounter++)
00503       {
00504      RemoveButton(giIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButton[ iCounter ] );
00505      UnloadButtonImage(giIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButtonImage[ iCounter ] );
00506              giIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButton[ iCounter ] = -1;
00507       }
00508 
00509       
00510       return;
00511 }

00513 
00514 void BtnIMPPersonalityQuizAnswer0Callback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00515 {
00516 
00517       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00518       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00519             return;
00520 
00521  if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00522       {
00523             btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00524 
00525             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00526             {
00527       // reset buttons
00528                   ResetQuizAnswerButtons( );
00529 
00530                   // ok, check to see if button was disabled, if so, re enable
00531       CheckStateOfTheConfirmButton( );
00532 
00533                   iCurrentAnswer = 0;
00534                   // now set this button on
00535       btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00536               
00537                   
00538 
00539                   // highlight answer
00540               PrintImpText( );
00541                   
00542                   // the current and last question numbers
00543           PrintQuizQuestionNumber( );
00544 
00545                   fReDrawCharProfile = TRUE;
00546             }
00547       }
00548 }

00551 void BtnIMPPersonalityQuizAnswer1Callback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00552 {
00553 
00554       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00555       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00556             return;
00557 
00558       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00559       {
00560             btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00561 
00562             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00563             {
00564       // reset buttons
00565                   ResetQuizAnswerButtons( );
00566 
00567                   // now set this button on
00568       btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00569               
00570                   // ok, check to see if button was disabled, if so, re enable
00571       CheckStateOfTheConfirmButton( );
00572 
00573                   iCurrentAnswer = 1;
00574 
00575                   // highlight answer
00576               PrintImpText( );
00577 
00578                   // the current and last question numbers
00579       PrintQuizQuestionNumber( );
00580             
00581                   fReDrawCharProfile = TRUE;
00582             }
00583       }
00584 }

00876 
00877 void BtnIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerConfirmCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00878 {
00879 
00880       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00881       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00882             return;
00883 
00884       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00885       {
00886              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00887      
00888       }
00889       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00890       {
00891             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00892             {
00893                   
00894       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00895               
00896                   if( iCurrentAnswer != -1)
00897                   {
00898 
00899                         // reset all the buttons
00900                         ResetQuizAnswerButtons( );
00901 
00902                         // copy the answer into the list
00903                 iQuizAnswerList[ giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion ] = iCurrentAnswer;
00904 
00905                         // reset answer for next question
00906                         iCurrentAnswer = -1;
00907         
00908                         // next question, JOHNNY!
00909                         if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion == giMaxPersonalityQuizQuestion )
00910                         {
00911                               giMaxPersonalityQuizQuestion++;
00912                         }
00913 
00914         giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion++;
00915                         CheckAndUpdateNextPreviousIMPQuestionButtonStates();
00916 
00917                         // OPPS!, done..time to finish up
00918                         if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion > 15)
00919                         {
00920                               iCurrentImpPage = IMP_PERSONALITY_FINISH;
00921                               // process
00922                               CompileQuestionsInStatsAndWhatNot( );
00923                         }
00924                   }
00925             }
00926       }
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 
00931 void BtnIMPPersonalityQuizStartOverCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00932 {
00933 
00934       // btn callback for IMP personality quiz answer button
00935       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00936             return;
00937 
00938       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00939       {
00940              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00941      
00942       }
00943       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00944       {
00945             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00946             {
00947                   
00948       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00949                   giPreviousPersonalityQuizQuestion = giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion;
00950                   giMaxPersonalityQuizQuestion = 0;
00951       fStartOverFlag = TRUE;
00952 
00953                   iCurrentImpPage = IMP_PERSONALITY;
00954                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00955                   iCurrentAnswer = -1;
00956             }
00957       }
00958 }
00959 
00960 void ResetQuizAnswerButtons( void )
00961 {
00962 
00963       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00964   INT32 iCnt = 0;
00965  
00966       // how many buttons to reset?
00967       switch( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion  )
00968       {
00969             case ( -1 ):
00970                   // do nothing
00971                   return;
00972                   break;
00973             case ( 0 ):
00974              // 6 buttons
00975          iCounter =6;   
00976             break;
00977             case ( 3 ):
00978                   // 5 buttons
00979      iCounter = 5;
00980     break;
00981             case ( 5 ):
00982                   // 6 buttons 
00983                   iCounter = 5;
00984             break;
00985             case ( 10 ):
00986                   // 6 buttons 
00987                   iCounter = 5;
00988             break;
00989             case ( 11 ):
00990                   // 9 buttons
00991       iCounter = 8;
00992             break;
00993             default:
00994       // 4 buttons
00995       iCounter = 4;
00996             break;
00997       }
00998 
00999       // now run through and reset the buttons
01000       for(iCnt = 0; iCnt < iCounter; iCnt++)
01001       { 
01002             ButtonList[ giIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButton[ iCnt ] ]->uiFlags &= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON); 
01003       }
01004 
01005       return;
01006 }
01007 
01008 
01009 void CompileQuestionsInStatsAndWhatNot( void )
01010 {
01011   // one BIG case/switch statement to determine what values are added where
01012   INT32 iCurrentQuestion = 0;
01013       
01014       for( iCurrentQuestion= 0; iCurrentQuestion < MAX_NUMBER_OF_IMP_QUESTIONS; iCurrentQuestion++ )
01015       {
01016             switch( iCurrentQuestion )
01017             {
01018                         
01019               // ok, run throught he list of questions
01020               case ( 0 ):
01021                     switch( iQuizAnswerList[ iCurrentQuestion ] )
01022                         {
01023                           case( 0 ):
01024                                     if( fCharacterIsMale )
01025                                     {
01026                                           // Martial arts
01027                                           AddSkillToSkillList( MARTIALARTS );
01028                                     }
01029                                     else
01030                                     {
01031                                           // for women, ambidexterious
01032                                           AddSkillToSkillList( AMBIDEXT );
01033                                     }
01034                           break;
01035           case( 1 ):
01036                                     AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList(  ATT_LONER );
01037                               break;
01038                               case( 2 ):
01039                                           // hand to hand
01040                                     AddSkillToSkillList( HANDTOHAND );
01041                               break;
01042           case( 3 ):
01043                                // lock picking
01044             AddSkillToSkillList( LOCKPICKING );
01045                               break;
01046                               case( 4 ):
01047                                 // throwing
01048                                     AddSkillToSkillList( THROWING );
01049                               break;
01050                               case( 5 ):
01051                                 // optimist 
01052                                      AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_OPTIMIST );
01053                               break;
01054                         }
01055               break;
01056           case ( 1 ):
01057                         switch( iQuizAnswerList[ iCurrentQuestion ] )
01058                         {
01059                           case( 0 ):
01060                                     // teaching
01061              AddSkillToSkillList( TEACHING );
01062                           break;
01063           case( 1 ):
01064                                AddSkillToSkillList( STEALTHY );
01065                               break;
01066                               case( 2 ):
01067                                // psycho
01068                                     AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( PSYCHO );
01069                               break;
01070           case( 3 ):
01071             AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList(  ATT_FRIENDLY );
01072                               break;                  
01073                         }
01074               break;
01075           case ( 2 ):
01076                         switch( iQuizAnswerList[ iCurrentQuestion ] )
01077                         {
01078                           case( 0 ):
01079                                     // lock picking
01080             AddSkillToSkillList( LOCKPICKING );
01081                           break;
01082           case( 1 ):
01083                                 // arrogant
01084                                     AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_ARROGANT );
01085                               break;
01086                               case( 2 ): 
01087                                     AddSkillToSkillList( STEALTHY );
01088                               break;
01089           case( 3 ):
01090                                           // normal
01091                                     AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_NORMAL );
01092                               break;
01093                               
01094                         }     
01095               break;
01096           case ( 3 ):
01097                         switch( iQuizAnswerList[ iCurrentQuestion ] )
01098                         {
01099                           case( 0 ):
01100                                     // automatic weapons
01101             AddSkillToSkillList( AUTO_WEAPS );
01102                           break;
01103           case( 1 ):
01104                                     // friendly
01105                                     AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList(  ATT_FRIENDLY );
01106 
01107                               break;
01108                               case( 2 ):
01109                                           // normal
01110                                     AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_NORMAL );
01111                               break;
01112           case( 3 ):
01113                                     // asshole
01114                                      AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_ASSHOLE );
01115                               break;
01116                               case( 4 ):
01117                                 AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList(  ATT_LONER );
01118                               break;
01119                                     
01120                         }
01121               break;
01122       case ( 4 ):
01123                         switch( iQuizAnswerList[ iCurrentQuestion ] )

01125                           case( 0 ):
01126                                 // coward

01128                           break;
01129           case( 1 ):
01130                                     // none
01131                               break;

01133                                           // aggressive

01339                               case( 2 ):
01340                                 // heat problems
01341             AddAPersonalityToPersonalityList( HEAT_INTOLERANT );
01342                               break;
01343           case( 3 ):
01344                                 // none
01345                               break;
01346                         }
01347               break;
01348               case ( 14 ):
01349                         switch( iQuizAnswerList[ iCurrentQuestion ] )
01350                         {
01351                           case( 0 ):
01352                                     // throwing
01353             AddSkillToSkillList( THROWING );
01354                           break;
01355           case( 1 ):
01356                                     // ambidexterous
01357                                     AddSkillToSkillList( AMBIDEXT );
01358                               break;
01359                               case( 3 ):
01360                                 // none
01361                               break;
01362           case( 2 ):
01363                                AddAnAttitudeToAttitudeList( ATT_ARROGANT );
01364                               break;
01365                         
01366                         }
01367               break;
01368               case ( 15 ):
01369                         switch( iQuizAnswerList[ iCurrentQuestion ] )
01370                         {
01371                           case( 0 ):
01372                                     // none !
01373                           break;
01374           case( 1 ):
01375                                     // none !
01376                               break;
01377                               case( 2 ):
01378                                     // none !
01379                               break;
01380           case( 3 ):
01381                                     // none !
01382                               break;
01383                         }
01384               break;
01385             }
01386   }
01387 }

01390 void BltAnswerIndents( INT32 iNumberOfIndents )
01391 {
01392   INT32 iCounter = 0;
01393       
01394       
01395       // the question indent
01396   RenderQtnIndentFrame( 15, 20 );
01397 
01398 
01399   // the answers
01400 
01401       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOfIndents; iCounter++)
01402       {
01403             switch( iCounter )
01404             {
01405               case( 0 ):
01406         if( iNumberOfIndents < 5 )
01407                         {
01408           RenderQtnLongIndentFrame(BTN_FIRST_COLUMN_X + INDENT_OFFSET, 93);
01409           
01410                               if( iCurrentAnswer == iCounter )
01411                               {
01412                                     RenderQtnLongIndentHighFrame( BTN_FIRST_COLUMN_X + INDENT_OFFSET, 93 );
01413                               }
01414                         }
01415         else
01416                         {

01418                               
01419                               if( iCurrentAnswer == iCounter )
01420                               {
01421                                     RenderQtnShortIndentHighFrame( BTN_FIRST_COLUMN_X + INDENT_OFFSET, 93 );
01422                               }
01423                         }
01424               break;
01425               case( 1 ):

01427                         {

01429

01431                               {

01433                               }
01434                         }
01435         else
01436                         {

01438                               
01439                               if( iCurrentAnswer == iCounter )
01440                               {
01441                                     RenderQtnShortIndentHighFrame( BTN_FIRST_COLUMN_X + INDENT_OFFSET, 143 );
01442                               }
01443                         }
01444               break;

01449

01451                         {

01453                         }

01458                         
01459                         if( iCurrentAnswer == iCounter )
01460                         {
01461                           RenderQtnShortIndentHighFrame( BTN_FIRST_COLUMN_X + INDENT_OFFSET, 193 );
01462                         }
01463                   }
01464               break;

01466

01475                               {

01478 
01479                               }
01480                               // done

01482                         }

01485                         {

01491                               }
01492                         }

01572 void PrintQuizQuestionNumber( void )
01573 {
01574   // this function will print the number of the current question and the numebr of questions
01575 
01576       CHAR16 sString[ 10 ];
01577 
01578 
01579       // setup font
01580       SetFont( FONT12ARIAL);
01581       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
01582       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
01583 
01584       // get current question number into a string
01585       swprintf(sString, L"%d", giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion + 1);
01586   
01587       // print current question number
01588   mprintf( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 345 , LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 370 ,sString);
01589 
01590   // total number of questions
01591   mprintf( LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + 383 , LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + 370 , L"16");
01592   return;
01593 }

01725 void CheckAndUpdateNextPreviousIMPQuestionButtonStates( void )
01726 {
01727       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion >= giMaxPersonalityQuizQuestion )
01728       {
01729             DisableButton( giNextQuestionButton );
01730       }
01731       else
01732       {
01733             EnableButton( giNextQuestionButton );
01734       }
01735 
01736       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion == 0 )
01737       {
01738             DisableButton( giPreviousQuestionButton );
01739       }
01740       else
01741       {
01742             EnableButton( giPreviousQuestionButton );
01743       }
01744 }

01747 void MoveAheadAQuestion( void )
01748 {
01749 
01750       // move ahead a question in the personality question list
01751       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion < giMaxPersonalityQuizQuestion )
01752       {
01753             giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion++;
01754 
01755             iCurrentAnswer = -1;
01756             CheckStateOfTheConfirmButton( );
01757 
01758             iCurrentAnswer = iQuizAnswerList[ giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion ];
01759       }
01760 
01761       CheckAndUpdateNextPreviousIMPQuestionButtonStates( );
01762 
01763 /*
01764       EnableButton( giPreviousQuestionButton );
01765 
01766       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion >= giMaxPersonalityQuizQuestion )
01767       {
01768             DisableButton( giNextQuestionButton );
01769             iCurrentAnswer = -1;
01770       }
01771       else
01772       {
01773             EnableButton( giNextQuestionButton );
01774       }
01775 */
01776       return;
01777 }
01778 
01779 void MoveBackAQuestion( void )
01780 {
01781       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion > 0 )
01782       {
01783             giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion--;
01784 
01785             iCurrentAnswer = -1;
01786             CheckStateOfTheConfirmButton( );
01787 
01788             iCurrentAnswer = iQuizAnswerList[ giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion ];
01789       }
01790 
01791       EnableButton( giNextQuestionButton );
01792 
01793       CheckAndUpdateNextPreviousIMPQuestionButtonStates( );
01794 /*
01795       if( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion == 0 )
01796       {
01797             DisableButton( giPreviousQuestionButton );
01798       }
01799       else
01800       {
01801             EnableButton( giPreviousQuestionButton );
01802       }
01803 */
01804       return;
01805 }

01807 void ToggleQuestionNumberButtonOn( INT32 iAnswerNumber )
01808 {
01809       if( ( giCurrentPersonalityQuizQuestion <= giMaxPersonalityQuizQuestion ) && ( iAnswerNumber != -1 ) )
01810       {
01811             // reset buttons
01812             ResetQuizAnswerButtons( );
01813             
01814             // toggle this button on
01815             ButtonList[ giIMPPersonalityQuizAnswerButton[ iAnswerNumber ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01816             iCurrentAnswer = iAnswerNumber;
01817       }
01818 
01819       return;
01820 
01821 }
01822 
01823 void PreviousQuestionButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 iReason )
01824 {
01825       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01826         return;
01827 
01828       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01829       {
01830              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01831       }
01832       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01833       {
01834             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01835             {
01836                   MoveBackAQuestion( );
01837       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01838             }
01839       }
01840       return;
01841 }
01842 
01843 
01844 void NextQuestionButtonCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 iReason )
01845 {
01846       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01847         return;
01848 
01849       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01850       {
01851              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
01852       }
01853       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01854       {
01855             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01856             {
01857                   MoveAheadAQuestion( );
01858       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01859             }
01860       }
01861       return;
01862 }
